author: Greutmann, Matthias and Tobler, Daniel and Biaggi, Patric and Mah, May Ling and Crean, Andrew and Oechslin, Erwin N and Silversides, Candice K

title: Echocardiography for assessment of right ventricular volumes revisited: a cardiac magnetic resonance comparison study in adults with repaired tetralogy of Fallot
